body.p: I was absent from home for a day or so & thus did not receive your note till yesterday evening= I think there can be no doubt of our being able to raise the money in your acceptance if the parties you name are not in a position to pay the amt due you; I will meet you in Lexington on Tuesday next, say on arrival of cars at Agl Dep Bank where we can see what can be done

Yours Very Truly
R. Aitcheson Alexander

P. S.
I made a mistake in the time named at wh I was obliged to have money it was 1st May not April=
